list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a line or outline which gradually deviates from being straight for some or all of its length.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the parapet wall sweeps down in a bold curve
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bức tường Parapet quét xuống trong một đường cong đậm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: form or cause to form a curve.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her mouth curved in a smile
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: miệng cô cong trong một nụ cười
